helpful to get a sense of your schedules, for planning purposes. 
Thanks,

Joe, 
Thank you for reaching out, and we would be happy to schedule a time to speak with you. I expect 
our schedules may be somewhat unpredictable tomorrow; would it work to set a time to talk on 
Tuesday? We can schedule it for before you meet wit}, if that's helpful. Or if you'd like

afternoon discussion. Please let us know what you prefer, and we look forward to being in touch. 
thank 
you,

best for you.
